attributes.review: Got this app to get some reliable trusty news on good ole’ Donald; unfortunately this news turned out to be propaganda. After one day of using I got WWII flashbacks and  started to have a panic attack— called 911 to get help and the cops threw me in jail after shooting me with rubber bullets for hyperventilating. 1/5 stars, cannot believe this app.
attributes.title: Unbelievable

attributes.review: As a Trump supporter, I was excited to see that there was an app made for true Americans like me! Surprisingly though, after initially opening the app, all of my fingers dislocated and I passed out. I awoke on my front porch to an orange man chewing off my fingers. Overall I would not recommend for anyone to download this app :(
attributes.title: He chewed my fingers off

attributes.review: I can’t even with this app. I’ve tried to download this app multiple times and each time it freezes. I am absolutely astonished at the poor quality of the application and will not be downloading it again.
attributes.title: Horrible quality

attributes.review: Great to have Trump exclusive, online events you can register for & news updates, all in one spot.
attributes.title: Love it!

attributes.review: This app literally doesn’t function properly. I tried to give it a chance but it freezes, started deleting my contacts? And it seems to auto text some of my frequent iMessage recipients. I can’t say I’m surprised but I can’t wait to those taxes!
attributes.title: An unpleasant experience
